column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////You will need to reserve a table way in advance because they do things right and the waiting list is long! Worth the wait. When you enter the restaurant
column2: you will sigh with content on the ambiance. The waiters are top shelf and well versed in GF options. Plenty of great options
column3: most things actually. There were 4 in our party and every single dish was outstanding! Yes
column4: the sides are a'l a 'carte but they are worth double what they charge
column5: really! You will be amazed how satisfying and complimentary the sides are to your main plate.
